description: Changeable weather is no problem with High Coast Hydratic Trousers. Made from Fjallraven's new 2.5-layer Hydratic they’ll keep you dry on rainy trips to school or work, or during your summer hikes. ¾-length zippers make for easy ventilation and taking on/off and Velcro tabs can be used to adjust the width of the lower legs – practical when biking or hiking. Made from recycled polyamide with a unique printed pattern on the inside.
name: Fjallraven High Coast Hydratic Trousers, Reg - Mens
